msbt.message: I guess I'm not very mature because folks keep saying, "You're not very mature!"So I've been tryin' to come up with ways to be more mature! I'm a grown up! I gotta act like it!

One mature thing I started doing is making coffee to drink with my morning snacks!But my coffee is the WORST! It's just angryhotblackwater!I gotta be doin' something wrong! Maybe I'm using too much dirt
I think maybe mature folks like spicy food? BecauseI don't like spicy food. It's too spicy!I've been trying to like it, even though it's killing my sense of tasteand that's my favorite sense!

A super mature thing to do is to eat stuff that's good for you, even if it makes you want to reverse eat!Stuff like microwaved beetsboiled brussels sproutsor mostly thawed spinach <10_10 />BLECH!<10_9 />Grandpa has no idea what he's doing in the kitchen But he sure is mature!
There are so many mysteries in life,

Like mirrors! Ya know how mirrors show your reflection, except it's all backwards and stuff?Well, how come it's only flipped sideways? Why not up and down too?And why can't vampires reflect? Vampire costumes reflect! Vampire bats reflect!Mirrors are soooooo busted!
Didja ever wonder what Santa Claus is doing in March?I bet he takes the elves somewhere nice and tropicalLike Chummy's Tropical Buffet! They have a mile-long sundae bar! And shark rides!

Like, why's water clear? Everything else has a color. Treesflowersthe crumbs between my toesOh! Do you think whoever was supposed to color water fell asleep on the job?They should've asked for my help. I LOVE coloring stuff!

I was just thinking about a story Grandma told me, but I forget how it goes"Once upon a time, a girl went to a ball after a magical fairy cast a spell to make her a princess.""When the spell was about to run out, the girl ran off, leaving behind" Umm Uh

Oh yeah! I remember! She bonked her head on a doorway because she was way tall, and her tiara fell off!The prince only figured out who she was when he saw her playing basketball at the park!So they played basketball together all the time! For happily ever after!

Oh yeah, it was her slipper! And the prince figured out who she was because it smelled like her feet!Oh! The prince was a dog! Did I say that? It's why the smell part was important.But then everyone was happy! And that's the end!
A business card! That makes sense Why make it hard for the prince to find her? Be direct!OK! I'm gonna get business cards for myself too! They'll say, " Snacky Dude"!
! I'm glad you're here. Something's really been bugging me.

Do fish have ears or what?! I keep thinking about it every dinnertime when I'm eating fishBecause ears are where bugs hide when they're cold! Or when they have a secret to tell!I can't eat bugs! Too many of my friends are bugs!

Ya know how when ya wear socks and drag your feet on the carpet, you can get an electric shock?I always get ka-zapped when I touch the doorknoband I'm starting to like that zappy feeling!BZZZZZZZZT!<10_4 /> BZZZZZZZZT!<10_4 /> That doorknob is the best.
How come a cactus has needles? Does it not want friends? Does it hate balloons?Ormaybecactusususes are just misunderstood? Maybe I'll talk to a cactus about being friends.
Guess what, ?
I can fall asleep less than three seconds after I tuck myself in. Not bragging. It's just true.
I can tell what time it is just by how hungry I am!The way my stomach's rumbling now, I'd say it's...:.<10_4 /> Real cool, huh, ?
I can tell what folks are having for dinner just by the smell! It's basically a superpower.
I've been working on some new ways to say "hi" to folks around the island
One idea is to use a super-polite but super-LOUD voice from far away. LIKE THIS! WHAT DO YOU THINK?!

One idea that I wanna try is being a little quieter. You know, in case we're nervous about meeting up. Just like"HEY! It's me, !"Ahh! I did it again Sorry. I guess I get kinda loud when I'm nervous, .

I think I want to start by answering a question that the other person hasn't even asked yet.LikeI'll just say, "My favorite food is ." And then they won't know WHAT to say!And then we'll get some together and hang out. Win-win!
Gooood morning! It's !Sorry, I just wake up at full volume and slowly get quieter until I fall asleep for that first nap of the day.
Yooooo! It's me, !I'm using my outdoor voice! A huh huh huh
Nighty-night! Sincerely, !Oh, was that too loud? Also, I'm not going to bed yet. Just warming up for the grand finale, a huh huh
Y'know what? I've been thinking I might wanna get serious about picking up .
The first thing I gotta do is look for a good place to do it. But I dunno what makes a place good for that.So the FIRST first thing I gotta do is figure that out, .

But I need equipment, right? Only thing is, I don't know if I need gloves or pads or sticks or what.So I guess I got some readin' up to do first. But I dunno where to find books about it. Boy, sports are complicated, huh?
First things first! I gotta get at least one other player, right?Or do I? How many players do you need for a game? Is it even called a game? Is it a match? Who knows
Actually, y'know what? I don't think I ever learned the rules.How come you gotta know so much to play a sport? Maybe I'll just run around instead.
Hey! Hey, ! Hey!Look at my face. Real close. Get all up in there. See it? It's rightthere. See that teeny, tiny mark? It's a scar!

I got it in a tragic book accident. I was in bed and decided to read my favorite book, .I opened it, and the castle foldout popped up. But I guess I wasn't holding the book far away enoughAnyway, the scar's kinda, sorta like the one the hero has in my OTHER favorite pop-up book, so I like it!

OK, so did you know that gymnastics stuff is actually really, super hard?I got bored once and went to try those horizontal-bar thingies. I think they call 'emhorizontal bars.Anyway, I wasn't paying attention when I walked in, and I smacked my head on one. And it left this scar.That's when I learned how hard gymnastics stuff is. It's super hard! That bar didn't budge one bit!

I was making grilled cheese and saw a monster! I yelled and grabbed the wrong thing and then Ouchie.Promise me you'll always be super- duper careful when you're cooking! 'Cause stuff can get real hot!Like, even if there's a monster and your grilled cheese smells so good Even then! Watch what you're doing!Man, there is NOTHING worse than eating cold grilled cheese 'cause you weren't careful enough
